title: Design-Based Instructional Workshop for Integrated STEM Education (K-12)

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of Basic Educational Curriculum or Interest in Solving Everyday Problems
context.additional_context: Primarily composed of general citizens with limited educational experience but high interest in STEM integration applicable to daily life; digital devices (basic tablets or laptops) are available

learning_goals: Learners can plan and execute real-life problem-solving projects utilizing 3D modeling.
Learners can design STEM-integrated education programs by applying the Design Thinking process.
Learners can derive project improvement plans by collaborating with peer learners using formative assessment tools.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
